mapper.insert: insert into cs_mbrattrmid_info ( INS_TYPE, INS_VALUE, ATTR_ID, EFF_DATE, ATTR_NO, ATTR_VALUE, GRP_NO, EXP_DATE, OP_TIME, OP_CODE, LOGIN_NO, OUP_ACCEPT, LOGIN_ACCEPT, OP_NOTE, SYSTEM_NOTE ) values ( #{insType}, #{insValue}, #{attrId}, #{effDate}, #{attrNo}, #{attrValue}, #{grpNo}, #{expDate}, #{opTime}, #{opCode}, #{loginNo}, #{outAccept}, #{loginAccept}, #{opNote}, #{systemNote} );

insert into cs_mbrattrmid_info_his ( INS_TYPE, INS_VALUE, ATTR_ID, EFF_DATE, ATTR_NO, ATTR_VALUE, GRP_NO, EXP_DATE, OP_TIME, OP_CODE, LOGIN_NO, OUP_ACCEPT, LOGIN_ACCEPT, OP_NOTE, SYSTEM_NOTE, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_TYPE, UPDATE_CODE, UPDATE_LOGIN, UPDATE_ACCEPT, UPDATE_DATE) values ( #{insType}, #{insValue}, #{attrId}, #{effDate}, #{attrNo}, #{attrValue}, #{grpNo}, #{expDate}, #{opTime}, #{opCode}, #{loginNo}, #{outAccept}, #{loginAccept}, #{opNote}, #{systemNote}, #{updateTime}, #{updateType}, #{updateCode}, #{updateLogin}, #{updateAccept}, #{updateDate} );
mapper.delete: delete from cs_mbrattrmid_info where INS_TYPE = #{insType} AND INS_VALUE = #{insValue} AND ATTR_ID = #{attrId} and EFF_DATE = #{effDate} AND ATTR_NO = #{attrNo} ;
mapper.select: select INS_TYPE, INS_VALUE, ATTR_ID, EFF_DATE, ATTR_NO, ATTR_VALUE, GRP_NO, EXP_DATE, OP_TIME, OP_CODE, LOGIN_NO, OUP_ACCEPT, LOGIN_ACCEPT, OP_NOTE, SYSTEM_NOTE from cs_mbrattrmid_info where INS_TYPE = #{insType} AND INS_VALUE = #{insValue} AND ATTR_ID = #{attrId} and EFF_DATE = #{effDate} AND ATTR_NO = #{attrNo} ;
